text:
The problem is in Namespace.loadBaseData().  It creates and removes /tempaction
in 2 separate transactions.  If the create tx succeeded and the remove tx
failed, /tempaction would be left in the database.  Next time when Slide starts
again, /tempaction can't be created and causes loadBaseData() to fail.

Resolution:
a) check if /tempaction exists before create it;
or
b) combine the 2 separate transactions into one.  I'm not sure if the 2 separate
transactions are there for a reason though.
creator: willievu@yahoo.com
